price: Basi Naapa kwa Mola wako Mlezi! Tutawahoji wote.
footnotes: Ikiwa hiyo hali yao, basi Wallahi kwa Aliye kuumba akakulinda na akakulea, hapana shaka tutawahisabu wote Siku ya Kiyama,

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany
